name: "Monsters"
description: This is an absolute wild "micro" Doom II level. Four rooms with 3 Spider Masterminds, 1 Cyberdemon, and 1 Revenant. There is no health and no armor, just a BFG9000 and some cells! The odds are stacked against you, but this level can be won! Warning: This level should not be played by anyone with a weak heart! This may be the best "micro" level you've ever played.
